item.description:
Sorry about the last minute notice, but please join us for a night of karaoke, with Tom as the DJ!

If you've ever wanted to be a star, now is your time to shine!! Please join us for a fun evening of singing. You don't HAVE to participate, it's just as much fun be in the audience.

Come sing with us at Lavender Asian Cuisine. We will be meeting at 8 pm to get something to eat before the singing begins. Karaoke starts at 9 pm and runs until 1am.

If you can't join us for dinner, don't let that stop you from join us afterwards.

Hope to see you all there!!
item.how_to_find_us: We will be in the restraunt section, probably with either a large table, or several small ones.
item.name: Karaoke @ Lavender's in Sudbury, MA
